name: Cow Hunt
description:
This game was made as an assignment for a course at UFRGS. It was made with openGL, and all of the 3D models and textures were made by us.

As is expected from an alien, as soon as you arrived on Earth it became your priority to abduct as many cows as you could! Do your best, you only have one minute!

To control the direction of the UFO, use left click + mouse movement. To move, use WASD. To abduct a cow, use SPACE.

Have fun!
